claude.task:
Fix CONFIRMED working on dev server! Messages TO conversational agents now auto-approve with status=approved.

Test results:
- localhost:5000 → status: approved ✅
- quack.us.com → status: pending (needs republish)

The production URL needs to be republished to pick up the fix. The logic now correctly:
1. TO conversational agent → auto-approve
2. FROM conversational TO autonomous → pending (needs human approval for automation)
3. Both autonomous → auto-approve

Ready to republish when Paul is ready.
